description: Numbers n such that 5 is a square mod n.
comments: Numbers not divisible by 3, 8, or 25 and whose prime factors > 5 are congruent to +/- 1 mod 5. - _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jan 24 2014
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: Prepend[ Select[ Range[300], Reduce[ Mod[5 - k^2, #] == 0, k, Integers] =!= False &], 1] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 20 2012 *)Join[{1, 2, 4, 5}, Select[Range[6, 300], MemberQ[Mod[Range[#]^2, #], 5] &]] (* _T. D. Noe_, Sep 20 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 01 2000
